inscription:
Inscription

at bottom, printed in black: [Vinum Cautis Innocum / Per Gerardum de Lairesse invent: et sculpt: et per Nicolaum Visscher edit: cum Privil: Ord: Gen: Belgu Faederati.]; on back, in pencil: [SILENUS SLEEPING H.37 / BEF. V #25 L.L] and [22.]
provenance: [James A. Bergquist, Newton Centre, Mass., until 2006; sold in August for POOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2006-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Drunken Silenus
